items.title: Add scoped slots
items.description: Find a way to add foreignObjects in scoped slots for nameLabels and parentLabels, allowing the display of richer content. Problem is using foreignObjects fails the auto size feature related to the parent g element width.
items.author: graphieros

exchanges.author: graphieros
exchanges.comment: Try out an #image slot in parentLabels & nameLabels using an image tag in the svg. It's very specific, but would make sense for some use cases.

items.title: Add stats tab in todo app
items.description: Add some stats in a tab of the todo app. A donut with breakdown per open/closed, another per priority
items.author: graphieros

items.title: Add filter by priority
items.description: Add a filter feature by priority and filter by component, description, in the Open tab of the todo list.
items.author: graphieros
